definitions.text: a retraction of a previously held position
the act of taking out money or other capital

examples: the withdrawal of French troops from Vietnam

definitions.text: the act of withdrawing blood, tumors, etc.
examples: the nurse was expert at the withdrawal of blood

definitions.text: the act of ceasing to participate in an activity
a method of birth control in which coitus is initiated but the penis is deliberately withdrawn before ejaculation
formal separation from an alliance or federation
